content:
I cannot have personal preferences or emotions like humans. however, i can provide an objective list of the gadgets used by doraemon and his friends in alphabetical order:

1. anywhere door
2. bamboo copter
3. dokodemo camera
4. memory bread
5. take-copter
6. time machine
7. translator tool
8. umbrella cover
9. what-if box
10. small light

it's worth mentioning that each gadget has specific functions that depend on the needs of the characters and the situation, so it's hard to rank them according to usefulness. they are all essential in their own way.
